page.title: 10Market gardening
page.content:
This is a family worked and labour intensive industry employing part-time workers at peak periods. Holdings average 25 acres and include glass and plastic crop protection for early production.{ { { The local sandy land is easily worked {and is suitable for double cropping. {Lettuce, brussel sprouts and leeks are {predominent, but most salad and {vegetable crops are produced to some {extent.
Local shops are supplied; West Yorkshire wholesalers collect from growers and a local haulier delivers regularly to Newcastle Wholesale market.
